name: sablenite
effect: Held: Allows Sableye to Mega Evolve into Mega Sableye.
short_effect: Held: Allows Sableye to Mega Evolve into Mega Sableye.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Sableye hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
